author: Advance Local Weather Alerts |
title: Central NY under a flood advisory until early Thursday morning
text:
On Wednesday at 9:53 p.m. a flood advisory was issued by the National Weather Service in effect until Thursday at 4 a.m. for Madison, Oneida and Onondaga counties.
The weather service describes, “Flooding caused by rainfall and snow melt is expected.”
“Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas,” describes the weather service. “Turn around, don’t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.”

author: Devante
title: Mushroom Supplements: Enhancing Your Wellness Routine
text:
Enhance your health with mushroom supplements in Australia, leveraging the power of functional or medicinal mushrooms that have carved a niche in the wellness industry. Offering a plethora of health benefits, from boosting immunity to enhancing cognitive functions, these mushrooms transcend the culinary realm.
Beyond edible varieties like Reishi, Lion’s Mane, and Chaga used in cooking, options extend to powders, capsules, and tinctures.
Dive into how these organic supplements can seamlessly integrate into your daily routine, exploring their benefits and versatile uses.
Table of Contents
Toggle
The Magic of Mushrooms: Revealing Their Health Benefits Finding Your Perfect Mushroom Match Tips for Maximising the Benefits of Mushroom Supplements Conclusion The Magic of Mushrooms: Revealing Their Health Benefits For centuries now, mushrooms have been used in traditional medicine; it appears that modern science is only just beginning to catch up with the possibilities offered by traditional medicine.
Here are some of the key benefits they can provide:
Immune Support: Two examples of mushrooms supporting the body’s immunity are Turkey Tail and Reishi; these two are well-known for their abilities to guard one’s body against diseases. Enhance Cognitive Functioning: Mushrooms are also considered brain foods. An example of this kind of mushroom is Lion’s Mane which is famous for enhancing one’s memory, concentration and general cognitive function. Stress Relief and Anxiety Mitigation: Another type of adaptogenic mushroom is Reishi which can help the body when responding to stress. Additionally, adaptogenic mushrooms may make us feel calm and happy as well. Energy and Performance: Cordyceps mushrooms are frequently used by various athletes for increasing energy levels and improving physical performance without any jittery feeling linked to coffee consumption. Finding Your Perfect Mushroom Match There are many different types of mushroom supplements on the market today, making it difficult to know which one will be right for your body. To get started, you may read the quick guide made especially for you!:
Objective Recognition: To improve one’s welfare, try to identify your fitness goals. This will enable you to make the right choice from among the many types of mushrooms available. Professional Consultation: Always consult a medical expert before including supplements into your normal routine in order to be on the safer side in terms of health complications that may arise. Quality and Purity: You should go for reputable brands that use natural mushrooms and have them tested by an independent body. In this way, their efficiency and purity are ensured. Integration into Daily Routine: After establishing your targets and talking to an expert, start taking mushroom tablets into everyday life little by little. Morning Boost To begin the day with an added health kick, you may want to add mushroom powder to your morning coffee, tea or smoothie. If you prefer something simple and convenient, you can take mushroom capsules together with other morning supplements.
Lunchtime Refresher Sprinkle it over your salad or mix mushroom powder into a midday soup for a healthy boost at lunchtime. Water or herbal tea can become an excellent pick-me-up in the afternoon by adding a mushroom tincture.
Evening Ritual for Relaxation Mushrooms like Reishi have been known for their calming effects. They are taken at night to help calm you down and make sure that you have an undisturbed sleep. Mushroom hot cocoa or tea is a great way to relax before bed.
Tips for Maximising the Benefits of Mushroom Supplements To get the most out of your mushroom supplements, keep these tips in mind:
Consistency is Essential: Take supplements regularly as per the recommended dosage to experience the desired results. Monitor Your Response: Listen to your body’s reactions and adjust the timing or dosage accordingly. Combine with Healthy Habits: Supplement use should complement a balanced lifestyle with proper nutrition and exercise. Conclusion To add to your health regimen naturally and effectively, you must take mushroom supplements.
They come in diverse forms so that you can use them to address various issues like improving mental ability, boosting the immune system or promoting general good health.

author: @daily_trust
title: Mali bans French channel from TV packages - Daily Trust
text:
Mali’s military-led authorities have ordered the removal of television channel France 2 from broadcasting packages for four months over a story on the security situation, according to official documents seen by AFP Thursday.
The move is the latest by the junta to shun former colonial power France after seizing power in a military coup.
Mali’s High Authority for Communication (HAC) criticised a report broadcast on France 2’s evening news in January for “glorifying terrorism” by contrasting “the firepower of armed terrorist groups” with that of the Malian army.
The communications authority accused France 2 of retroactively “justifying” the presence of the French anti-jihadist Barkhane force which operated in Mali until 2022.
81% of working Nigerians don’t add value to the economy – Presidential Team Nigeria would have been worse without subsidy removal – FG French troops withdrew amid deteriorating relations between Bamako and Paris following military coups in 2020 and 2021.
Mali’s junta has since chosen to pivot towards Russia, both politically and militarily.
In a document sent to broadcasters, the HAC also cited “serious breaches” of journalistic ethics aimed at “demoralising the troops and the population”.
In 2022, Mali’s military leaders suspended the widely followed French networks France 24 and Radio France Internationale.
Correspondents from several foreign media were forced to leave, go into exile or suspend work.
The military also seized power in neighbouring Burkina Faso and Niger in 2022 and 2023 respectively, with both introducing measures against the press.
Reporters Without Borders (RSF) said in a 2023 report that the Sahel region was in the process of becoming a “no-news zone”.

author: Eréndira Reyes
title: Netflix aumenta 35% el número de suscriptores y destaca serie mexicana
text:
Netflix superó las expectativas en su informe de ganancias del tercer trimestre, impulsado por el crecimiento de su negocio publicitario y un aumento significativo en las suscripciones. La empresa informó un aumento del 35% en su membresía con anuncios. Además adelantó que tiene planes para lanzar su servicio para gestionar los anuncios con tecnología en Canadá en el próximo trimestre y expansión más amplia en 2025 hacia otros territorios.
La compañía agregó 5.1 millones de nuevos suscriptores, más que los 4.5 millones proyectados, lo que elevó el total de suscriptores pagos a 282.7 millones.
Publicidad Aunque la empresa de streaming no prevé que la publicidad sea su principal motor de crecimiento hasta 2026, destacó que más del 50% de las nuevas membresías provienen de usuarios en el nivel con anuncios. Como resultado, las acciones de la empresa subieron un 5% en las operaciones posteriores a la presentación del informe.
Cabe destacar que dentro de las series más vistas en este trimestre estuvo la mexicana Accidente, misma que sumó 37.2 millones de visualizaciones en el mundo.
La compañía señaló tener ganancias por acción de 5.40 dólares, superando las expectativas de 5.12 dólares previstas por los analistas de Wall Street, mientras que los ingresos alcanzaron los 9,830 millones de dólares, también por encima de los 9,770 millones estimados.
Los ingresos netos del trimestre fueron de 2,360 millones de dólares, un aumento notable respecto a los 1,680 millones del año anterior, con un incremento en los ingresos del 15%, alcanzando los 9,830 millones de dólares en comparación con los 8,540 millones del mismo periodo de 2022.
De cara al futuro, Netflix espera generar 10,130 millones de dólares en ingresos para el cuarto trimestre. Para 2025, la empresa anticipa ingresos entre 43,000 y 44,000 millones de dólares, impulsados por la expansión de su oferta de series, películas y nuevas iniciativas como publicidad y juegos. Gran parte de este crecimiento se atribuirá a un aumento saludable en las suscripciones pagas.

author: Joe Lombardi
title: Recall Issued For Popular Snack Brands In 36 States, Including NJ
text:
ZB Importing LLC is voluntarily recalling certain lots of six varieties of Ulker Brand snack products due to undeclared wheat, egg, and/or milk in the ingredient list and/or "Contains" statement on product labels.
People with allergies or severe sensitivities to these ingredients could experience serious or life-threatening reactions if they consume the affected items.
Affected Distribution Areas
Products were distributed through retail stores in Ontario, Canada, and the following states:
- Alabama
- Arkansas
- California
- Colorado
- Connecticut
- Delaware
- District of Columbia
- Florida
- Georgia
- Illinois
- Indiana
- Kentucky
- Louisiana
- Massachusetts
- Maryland
- Michigan
- Minnesota
- Missouri
- Mississippi
- Nebraska
- New Hampshire
- New Jersey
- New Mexico
- New York
- North Carolina
- Ohio
- Oklahoma
- Pennsylvania
- Rhode Island
- South Carolina
- Tennessee
- Texas
- Virginia
- Washington
- Wisconsin
- West Virginia
The issue was discovered after a consumer reported an allergic reaction linked to one of the recalled products. According to the company, the mislabeling originated from a supplier who failed to fully disclose all allergens during the translation of ingredient lists. In response, ZB Importing is implementing stricter labeling controls and an additional verification process for multilingual packaging.
Anyone who purchased the affected Ulker Brand products is advised to return them to the place of purchase for a full refund. Consumers with questions can contact the company at info@ziyad.com.

author: 网易
title: 切尔西总价7430万打包葡体2小将引发热议，球迷：颜值、肤色正确|英超|葡萄牙|切尔西队_网易订阅
text:
今天凌晨，来自葡萄牙体育队的官方消息，英超豪门切尔西队已经签下队中的两名小将，分别是17岁的昆达、20岁的埃苏戈。其中昆达的转会费是5100万欧元+130万欧元浮动条款，而埃苏戈的转会费为2200万欧元，前者会在2026年正式加入切尔西，而后者将在今年夏天就加入切尔西。
昆达是葡萄牙籍中场球员，目前身价3000万欧元，本赛季各项赛事出战44场打入2球加8个助攻，他的身高为1.72米。而埃苏戈也是葡萄牙籍中场球员，身高是1.78米，本赛季各项赛事出战19场打入1球，没有助攻。目前昆达在葡萄牙体育队效力，而埃苏戈被租借到拉斯帕尔马斯。
对于切尔西的这两笔交易，引发球迷热议，球迷1表示：颜值、肤色正确啊。
球迷2表示：切尔西是真的有钱啊。
球迷3表示：切尔西的钱大风刮来的？
球迷4表示：直接砸钱啊。
球迷5表示：很切尔西。
球迷6表示：又开始进货了。
球迷7表示：花不完，根本花不完。
球迷8表示：切尔西的转会操作令人不解，不知道切尔西想干什么？
球迷9表示：车子还能签多少人？
球迷10表示：基因正确。
球迷11表示：有这么多钱，买几个巨星不行吗？买一堆不出名的，成绩也上不去，不知道切尔西的高层怎么想的，想成为球星中转站吗？
